item.title: BO - Shop Parameters - Order Statuses - CRUD
item.description: BO - Shop Parameters - Order Statuses - CRUD Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-3211 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Shop Parameters > Order Settings > Go to Statuses tab Page title contains “Statuses” Click on the “Add new order status” Add new Order status page is displayed Fill all fields > Save Message Successful creation is displayed
